components.description: A person playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.
components.title: Handball

description: A person playing the sport of handball, shown jumping in the air about to throw the ball. Apple's design is shown wearing protective goggles.
title: Handball

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Person Playing Handball was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 under the name ‚ÄúHandball‚Äù and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016. Copy and paste http://emojipedia.org/handball/
emoji_net_data.name: person playing handball

bn:13656166v: To illegally touch the ball with the hand or arm.

bn:13656167v: To (legally) pass a football by holding it with one hand and hitting it with the other.

bn:00008124n: One of the two male reproductive glands that produce spermatozoa and secrete androgens
The female gamete of an animal or plant, capable of fusing with a male gamete to produce a zygote.
"Bollocks" is a word of Anglo-Saxon origin, meaning "testicles".
The testicle is the male gonad in animals.
The male sex gland that produces sperm and male hormones, found in some types of animals.
The male sex and endocrine gland, found in some types of animals, that produces sperm and male sex hormones, including the steroid testosterone.
Internal organ used in the male reproductive system

bn:00042794n: A game played in a walled court or against a single wall by two or four players who strike a rubber ball with their hands
A team sport where two teams of seven players each (six players and a goalkeeper) pass and bounce a ball trying to throw it in the goal of the opposing team. (source: wikipedia)
A team sport where two teams of seven players each (six players and a goalkeeper) pass and bounce a ball trying to throw it in the goal of the opposing team.
Handball is a team sport in which two teams of seven players each pass a ball to throw it into the goal of the other team.

bn:00036052n: An act of passing a football by holding it with one hand and hitting it with the other.
An act that violates the rules of a sport.
Fouls and misconduct in association football are acts committed by players which are considered deemed by the referee to be unfair and are subsequently penalized.
An act that violates the rules of a sport
Unfair act by a player in association football
